titleStmt.title: The copie of a letter sent out of the Netherlands, to a gentleman in England touching the present distempers of this kingdome, or some particular relations how the affaires goe in England, observed by the Netherlands.
titleStmt.author: Waersegger, Abraham.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Abraham Waersegger, which is a pseudonym.
Dated at end: 18. Junii stilo veteri.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
